definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The luxuriant design and magnificent model of this theatre make the artistic atmosphere aristocratic.
sentences.chinese: 該劇院華麗的設計造型，使藝術氣氛貴族化了。

sentences.english: She was finished at an exclusive school.
sentences.chinese: 她在一個貴族化的學校完成教育。
